usage: Used for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation exercises, and home or gym workouts.
key_features: Ideal for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
Durable and resistant to wear and tear

ai_description: A pair of black hexagonal dumbbells, each clearly marked “KAKSS 5 KG” in white on the ends. The compact, coated metal design features a non-slip neoprene finish and flat sides to prevent rolling, shown in clean studio shots and lifestyle gym settings.
target_audience: Home and gym users looking for 5 kg dumbbells for strength training and general fitness, including beginners to advanced exercisers.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (5kg pack of 2, Black)
